name: Daily Grocery Scrape

on:
  schedule:
    # This runs at 3:00 AM UTC every single day
    - cron: '0 3 * * *'
  workflow_dispatch: # This adds a manual "Play" button on GitHub for testing

jobs:
  build:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    steps:
      - name: Checkout code
        uses: actions/checkout@v3

      - name: Set up Python
        uses: actions/setup-python@v4
        with:
          python-version: '3.9'

      - name: Install dependencies
        run: pip install -r requirements.txt

      - name: Run Scraper
        env:
          # This maps your hidden GitHub Secrets to your Python code
          SUPABASE_URL: ${{ secrets.SUPABASE_URL }}
          SUPABASE_KEY: ${{ secrets.SUPABASE_KEY }}
        run: python Web_Scraping.ipynb
